content: mosaic bricks tote - crochet pattern this pattern is available for free on my blog - www loopsandlovecrochet com here you are paying to purchase an ad-free printable pdf version of this crochet pattern the mosaic bricks tote is made from the bottom up using the mosaic crochet technique to create the brick laying effect the handles/straps are crocheted in the last few rounds of the bag this crochet bag pattern includes two bag sizes one small sized and one large sized when finished and laying flat the small-sized bag is approx 9 inches wide and 10 inches tall not including the handles the large-sized bag is approximately 12 5 inches wide and 13 inches tall not including the handles you ll also find a video tutorial to go along with the written pattern on my youtube channel links in the pattern or on my blog this crochet pattern is easy to follow and intermediate-beginner friendly but still fun for more experienced crocheters i hope you enjoy making this bag it looks great in all different color combinations materials worsted weight cotton yarn you can use any worsted-weight cotton yarn or cotton blend o small tote requires 110g/210yds 77g/143 yds of main color and 33g/62yds of accent color o large tote requires 210g/400yds 135g/257yds of main color and 35g/67yds of accent color crochet hook 4mm size yarn needle for weaving in ends **you may make and sell any items made from this pattern but please link back to this pattern or loops & love crochet please do not share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose in whole or in part please do not re-publish photos as your own thank you for for supporting loops & love crochet thank you and happy crocheting loops & love crochet
